title: Has America ever had a political dynasty? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: No the purpose of our system is to avoid dynasties. But their have been a lot of American families in politics. The Roosevelt's, the Bush's, the Kennedy's and the Clinton's. The Roosevelt's had two actually good Presidents Franklin and Teddy. The Kennedy's produce a few Congressmen, senator's, Attorney General and a President. The Bush family produced two Governor's and two Presidents. Bill Clinton was President and his wife was a senator and secretary of state. John Adams was one of the founding fathers and President. His son was President but only served one term.

Yes, the Virginia dynasty, 1800-1824. You could even include Washington in 1788-1796 if you wanted. Jefferson was in charge from 1800-1808, then endorsed Madison, who was in charge from 1808-1816, and then Madison endorsed Monroe, who was president from 1816-1824.
